name: Pixelay Compare Design to Web
description:
Compare your Figma designs with real websites in the browser, using smart overlays.


Features


  • Compare multiple Figma designs and URLs at the same time.
  • No user accounts or desktop apps required.
  • Transparency, split-screen, toggle, drag and diff overlays.
  • Optionally specify different website page URLs per Figma frame.
  • Light-weight Chrome Extension enables comparing live websites.
  • Supports localhost using BrowerSync or Hot Module Reloading.
  • Built-in pixel ruler for measuring space differences in comparisons.
  • Get perfect web builds that match your Figma designs, every time.


To use Pixelay


  1. Install Pixelay and run the plugin inside your page.
  2. Select the frames you want to compare with your website.
  3. Paste in the URL(s) you would like to compare your frames to.
  4. Click the Upload Designs button.
  5. Install the Chrome Extension (to support production URLs).
  6. Open your Pixelay web app URL in Chrome.


Documentation & Video Tutorials


For plugin/web app documentation and step by step video tutorials, visit https://docs.figmatic.com/pixelay


Bug Reports


Pixelay is still a baby panda; if you notice any bugs, please get in touch via https://www.figmatic.com/contact and we'll publish a fix as soon as possible.


License


After you've tried comparing Figma designs with Pixelay 10 times, you'll be asked to enter your license key. Your license key will allow you or your team to compare an unlimited amount of Figma designs using Pixelay.


To purchase a license or to find out more, please visit https://figmatic.com/pixelay
